about_the_game:
◆ Story

18 years ago, Cardinal Gilbert was punished by the archbishop for committing a mistake in the capital's archdiocese. He was demoted to the remote seaside town of Kynaston, where he would succeed the deceased ex-bishop and govern for 20 years.

Time passed by quickly, and Kynaston became a prosperous commercial town. The daughter he had adopted from the orphanage here, Emily, also celebrated her 18th birthday.

Without a "Blessed Girl"—an agent appointed as the saint guardian by the goddess Aphro —for a long time, the town would inevitably fall back into poverty and destruction!

Gilbert, who observed that Emily was no less qualified than any previous saints, decided to make her a saint. However, as she was not a blessed girl, she faced opposition from the believers. Thus, he made an agreement with everyone that if she could not be acknowledged within two years, she would step down from the position of saint.

While Gilbert was guiding Emily to become a saint, an intruder appeared in the church! He was so elusive that he successfully escaped the church's pursuit again and again, giving Gilbert a headache. What was his purpose...!?

Two years were neither long nor short, and the time the two had to spend together was gradually running out. Would Emily be able to overcome the many difficulties and break the myth among believers that "an unblessed girl could not be a saint?" Would she realize her dream?

◆Gameplay Instructions

Every day is divided into three time periods. Players will take on the role of the bishop of Kynaston Town. Within two years, he should guide and train Emily to carry out various activities in the church or go out onto the streets to try various jobs and increase their income. Some actions will be unlocked as the plot develops.

After accumulating enough funds, you can invest in the expansion of the church and give Emily a better learning environment, increasing her learning and working efficiency.

You should not neglect your interactions with Emily. Interact with her enough to maintain your relationship or bring her even closer to you!

The various values ​​accumulated according to your actions will affect the final ending. Please confirm her study plan now and again, complete all tasks, and arrange the best future for her!

◆Game Features

◇ 30 basic CGs, including many differentials and 11 motion HCGs

◇ Game text: ca. 120,000

◇One main female character—sex with the protagonist and other people are included, but you can also complete the story with pure love.

◇ A simulation game with the goal of raising your daughter to be a saint

◇ 8 normal endings, 2 extra endings, and 2 bad endings during the story

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Non-Consensual Sex, Explicit Sexual Acts, Incest sex. All characters are over 20 years old.

name: Holy Whore Emily

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In the last two years of my tenure at Kynaston Church, I had to train my adopted daughter, Emily, to be a saint in her own right. However, since she was not appointed by the goddess, she received opposition from the believers. In the end, could she overcome the many difficulties and realize her dream?
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
